Reviews.Content: Happy with it, great price, fast shipping!I guess it 's a good product after all, I bought the same one again due to the fact that I lost the firts one in a bar in Hollywood, what can we say more about that :-)Very good camera, small enough, fast handling, I LIKE IT A LOT!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, perfect function and great digital photos.
Reviews.Author: JDC
Reviews.Content: The headline says it all, but to add to that we have found it as the perfect portable life recorder with more functionality than our phone cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!!
Reviews.Author: L. Herron
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes great pictures and the price is reasonable.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Tough on Cameras
Reviews.Author: Karl J Shackelford
Reviews.Content: I dropped the first one down a step rock embankment, the second so deep in a lake I couldn't find it, and this is my third. While I'm not good at protecting my cameras, I love this camera so much I just bought my third one. 99% of the pictures are clear, focused and sharp every time. The touch screen is easy to use and keeps me from fumbling for the right button to change a setting. Also easy to work in low light because the screen is backlit. Movie feature works well for my uses and the battery life seems very long and the charging time is relatively short for the length of battery life. All I need is a neck strap.....

Reviews.Title: Great beginner or advanced
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents to take on a cruise as a gift and they loved it!  I've only ever purchased Canon cameras and won't shoot with anything else.  When trying to find a camera that had all the features I'd want and the ease of learning for my parents, this was a no-brainer.  While they aren't the most tech-savvy, figuring this camera out and all the options was an ease for them and they have enjoyed it ever since.  I highly recommend this camera for not only beginners, but for advanced photographers wanting something pocket-sized instead of a DSLR as this can do so many of the same things.

Reviews.Title: A good solid camera
Reviews.Author: Critical Buyer
Reviews.Content: This camera though not quite the latest tech is an excellent camera which fits my wife's needs and is simple to use and produces excellent images It also does so in less than ideal lite conditions. It may have been a bit premature for Canon to discontimue this model

Reviews.Title: SD3500IS Love it!
Reviews.Author: Mike "raezak"
Reviews.Content: Was looking to replace my 2 year old camera, that has been with me around the world a couple of times with something new and exciting.  After reading the reviews I decided to keep it, as there was really nothing wrong with it.  It has all the features a traveler could use and it fits in my pocket ( a major factor). I have a few large chips 32GB, 16GB and some 8's that I fill up in Europe, Hawaii etc. what can I say I love it!![[ASIN:B0035FZJIK Canon PowerShot SD3500IS 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 3.5-Inch Touch Panel LCD and 5x Ultra Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Black)]]

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: umair
Reviews.Content: the touchscreen rocks.. Picture and video quality is great as well.. A very compact and durable camera for sure.. Battery seems ok as well.. I have been using it for a year now and love it!

Reviews.Title: battery case problem
Reviews.Author: pistachionuticecream
Reviews.Content: After only 16 months of use, this camera is broken. There is always showing "change battery" message on screen although the battery is fully charged. (I know it because I have two batteries and both can not be taken by the camera.)I searched the internet and it seems this battery case problem happened on some other canon cameras and models too. Totally disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good results
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Timely delivery, well packaged and the product, Cannon Powershot Sd3500IS,  was as advertised. I will recommend this retailer to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever
Reviews.Author: mikax
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  I love everything about it.  The quality of the pictures and videos are absolutely phenomenal.  I love this camera and am very glad that I bought it. It's PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: Great pics - overall Excellent but a little slow
Reviews.Author: Tyler D Servies
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about 9 months ago and use it a lot, both for still pics and short video clips. At the same time I bought a 8GB card and that has been plenty of capacity.The photos come out great and the camera is easy to use. I especially like the extremely wide angle view, which is what I chose this model for in the first place. It lets me get everyone in a room into a shot, even when I can't back up very far.The one thing that is a little irritating, and why I don't give it five stars, is that often when I want to take a fast shot the camera will take 2 or more seconds to actually snap the shot. With a 4 year old that is too long and I miss shots because of the slow response time.Otherwise I am very happy with this camera. It fits in a pocket easily, which means I can carry it all the time. The battery life is really good so I don't miss shots due to no battery. The optical zoom is very good, and lets me get close ups of my little soccer player from across the field or take the wider shot.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera. I have 2 small children so I wanted a small portable camera to take with me everywhere that can take great pictures of my crazy boys. This camera does it. I would love to have a DSLR for the shutter speed, but I can't afford one and they are too bulky for me. After a lot of research this one has a great shutter speed for such a small camera. It takes great pictures, I love the color accent feature. I am always getting compliments on the quality of the pictures I take. A great camera and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot 3500
Reviews.Author: William S. Tittle
Reviews.Content: This is a great piece of equipment especially for the traveler who wishes good results and convenience.  I purchased another one for my spouse for the upcoming trip.  Please be aware that the Operating System is incompatible with earlier versions of the Powershot line.  I lost 1000 of my wife's pictures on the most recent trip trying to be economical with SD card space when I used the remainder of the card from my wife's Powershot 600 in my 3500.W. Stewart TittleKlamath Falls, Oregon

Reviews.Title: ok but not great
Reviews.Author: B. Kang "untellectial"
Reviews.Content: i think this camera is just ok, it's my third and least favorite canona bit on the heavy side for its sizewhen reviewing pics, it has the annoying habit of not showing the full pic but a small version with highlighting of faces and technical informationthe touch screen is not so intuitive (like iphone); even after setting the touch motions, some of them rarely register, most often rather than doing a function the pics just advance as in a slideshow; the "tilting" noted above in the features for this camera never works for methis is my first canon that is experiencing erroneous low battery indication (one of my friends had the same problem on her camera), which can be very annoying. sometimes i will have to press the on button 5 or more times, sometimes i have to turn the image viewer on first, other times i have to remove the battery and re-insert it for the camera to turn on. this is a major annoyance when that perfect shot moment is lost because the camera takes forever to come on.

Reviews.Title: GOOD DEAL
Reviews.Author: PAT
Reviews.Content: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS CAMERA,TAKES VERY DETAILED PHOTO'S AND THE VIDEO IS COOL TOO. THE PRICE FOR WHAT YOU GET IS HARD TO BEAT CAN'T WAIT TO TAKE THIS CAMERA ON A BACK-PACK TRIP, SEE WHAT IT CAN DO IN THE BACK COUNTRY

Reviews.Title: Great wide angle-touchscreen only okay
Reviews.Author: T. L. Pester
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for my Canon SD 1400 which I misplaced for about six weeks. I knew the camera was larger and that the reviews on the touch screen were quite mixed. The wide-angle was appealing to me but I saw little use for the touch screen. I shot about 200 pictures of my granddaughter recently and found that I liked the touch screen to focus on an object that I specified by touching on the screen. It works like spot focus and spot metering on whatever is touched on the screen. Usually it was my granddaughter's face. It was impressive how much better pictures turned out by using the touch screen. Other than that I was not impressed with the touch screen which seemed to work well when accidentally touched, but when I wanted to do a function frequently the touch didn't do anything. It is definitely larger than the SB 1400 but is still small enough to be quite compact.it does video adequately but does not zoom while photographing video. It's not the best at everything it does but the whole package works well and I would buy the camera again and recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tom V
Reviews.Content: I have had Cannon cameras for years and every one has been great, this SD 3500 is no exception. The best I ever had for low light shots.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Giuseppe Graziano
Reviews.Content: Nice Camera and great price!!!The only negative point (for me) is the battery/memory card cover! it is to weak!

Reviews.Title: lovely in pink
Reviews.Author: camera crazy
Reviews.Content: I asked for this camera for Christmas and is my 6th and I am a die hard Canon fan.  I have 2 Canon Rebels 1 film and a digital with many accessories and 3 cameras for scuba.  I needed something small to take everywhere that could fit in my purse.  This camera takes photos just as good as my Rebels in a smaller package.  It has features even my Rebel doesn't have but you cannot get as creative with it but then again I have my Rebel for that.  I was not sure about the touch screen but after trying a couple other Canons I decided on this one. I actually received the SX130 IS after reviewing it, I though it would be what I was looking for.  However, the battery did not even last 1 day, I didn't care for the photo quality and I realized it was too big.  The second was the SD1300 IS which was an excellent camera but I really liked the touch screen better.  For this price and quality I think this is a great little camera plus I love the pink color.

Reviews.Title: Amazing point snd shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Delivery of this product was fast and on time.Camera specs were as advertised. Nice touchscreen, great wide angle and superb image quality.I recommend this camera for point and shoot mode. Light weight and good battery autonomy.

Reviews.Title: Canon SD3500is
Reviews.Author: John M. Lane "Feaquent Flyer"
Reviews.Content: Love the large screen!shoots great movies (in 3 different sizes)Haven't tried the HDMI yet.I droped the camera and the LED screen went pink with lines...(OH NO)Sent to Canon, was back to me in two weeks!I would recomend!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME camera!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera...so many great features...my mom got a different camera (Sony Cybershot) for Christmas and after seeing what my Canon Powershot could do, she returned hers and got the same one as me! This camera takes great photos :)

Reviews.Title: Canon 3500 - Great Camera - Great Experience
Reviews.Author: Kimball
Reviews.Content: I discovered this camera after talking to a friend.  No stores in town had it.  I went to Amazon and found it as a package and at a very good price.  I read reviews, liked what I saw and ordered it on the Monday before Christmas which was coming on Saturday.  They promised to deliver by Friday.  It arrived on Thursday!  It is a very cool camera.  Using on auto set is simple.  It does have a lot of features and isn't always easy to navigate for technically challenged but I do like the camera very much. I had a great experience ordering for the first time on Amazon.  I would not hesitate to use Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: This camera is the best!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl A. Lowery
Reviews.Content: I am surprised at the negative reviews of the PowerShot SD3500 IS camera.  I do most of my shooting with a Canon SLR, however, I always have my PowerShot SD3500 IS camera with me for those unexpected moments.  I set it to the "highest" image quality and I get beautiful pictures from this camera with and without the flash.  My only complaint is, which is common with most (if not all) P&S; cameras, is the lag time between pictures when using the flash.  Other than the lag, this is probably the best Canon P&S; camera I have had and I get a new one every year or so because of new features.  I am more than satisfied with my pictures coming from this P&S; camera.  Nothing beats a SLR, but again, I get beautiful pictures from this camera and am totally satisfied.  I purchased my last several cameras from Amazon and I must say that Amazon is the best in price and customer service.

Reviews.Title: Mike L.
Reviews.Author: Mike L.
Reviews.Content: For a point and shoot camera this has a nice feel and takes great pictures, it is all touch screen and the touch screen works well. Nice camera I would recommend it to a friend if what they were looking for was a point and shoot camera.. Mike

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, fast, and light
Reviews.Author: Shane W. Holloway
Reviews.Content: We love this Canon camera.  The touch screen makes so many things easier than other cameras.  Switching modes, focusing, and reviewing photos all use the same interface.

Reviews.Title: Powershot SD3500
Reviews.Author: MacGymnast
Reviews.Content: Great camera with it's many functions, but pictures aren't as crystal clear on the 3 1/2" touch screen as they were on the screen of my old 2 1/2" SD650.  It serves it's purpose well for a quick point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: The image quality isn't what I was expecting for a Canon camera.
Reviews.Author: Brandon Moretz
Reviews.Content: Overall, it is a quality product. As the title states the only drawback is the image quality isn't up to par with Canon cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Canon camera
Reviews.Author: jawgamimi
Reviews.Content: Had been searching for a new digital camera for several months.  A friend had one of these and I was very impressed with the quality of her pictures, love the touch screen and ease of handling.  Trying to be a frugal person, I kept checking prices and when Amazon dropped the price on the PINK one, I knew it was mine!  Love it!  The pictures turn out great - I just have no complaints.  I use this camera a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Judith M. Waller
Reviews.Content: I had a Canon Easy Shot and I absolutely loved it.  I dropped it and broke it.  After researching, I found the Canon PowerShot 3500 IS received great reviews and off to Walmart I went.  They didn't have this camera in stock so I bought a Sony Cybershot.  BIG MISTAKE - took great pictures during the day, but lousy pictures inside or at dusk and dark.  I returned it.  I went online to Amazon and ordered the PowerShot 3500 IS and I absolutely love it.The picture quality and easiness of using the camera is the best!  It takes great pictures under any condition and playback is so easy.  I am not a camera buff at all and am easily intimidated, but with this little camera I produce great pictures.  If you want a great camera this is it! Love Canon cameras!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: DustBunny
Reviews.Content: I just got the camera today and I can already tell I picked the right one. It was a toss up between the Nikon s8000 and the Canon, and I decided to go with the canon. The touch screen works great (even with a screen protector that I saw someone said not to use in another review). I really like the extra features that are not necessarily important but make picture taking more fun. The camera takes great photos so far, although I haven't really been able to get out and see what all its got. I may update later after having a chance to review it more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect point & shoot camera!!!
Reviews.Author: neoncity
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and pic are so vivid each and every time. Highly recommended for those who are looking for a new and great digital camera. The software which comes with the unit is very useful for editing as well. The large screen really makes a whole lot difference in viewing the pic from camera. touch screen? yeah, can't beat that too!

Reviews.Title: Lots of features in a small package!
Reviews.Author: Rodney Denton
Reviews.Content: We were replacing a canon camera that had gotten dropped in the tub by our 1 year old.  (He is so quick). The touch screen takes a little getting used to, but the pictures and video are the high quality that we have come to expect from canon!It suits my need for new, interesting gadgets to play with and learn about and my wife's more practical need for a small camera that can be slipped in a pocket, bag or purse and have on hand when needed.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot Sd3500IS
Reviews.Author: weather09 "Edgar"
Reviews.Content: For a small point and shoot camera, this is incredible. I have shot landscape to macro and had nothing turn out bad.The video is beautiful and very easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: Pink camera
Reviews.Author: Little Pecan "Judy"
Reviews.Content: I really love the size of the camera and ease of use.  I was a little disappointed in a self timed shot that did not appear focused properly.  I couldn't go back and retake as it was a birthday shot and I barely got my boys to sit still anyway.  The camera was on a stable object and so it should have focused great.  Otherwise I love the camera.  The video feature works very well.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SD3500IS 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 3.5-Inch Touch Panel LCD and 5x Ultra Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized
Reviews.Author: Hardik A. Patel
Reviews.Content: I love Canon's powershot SD*****IS cameras.. It does not matter which Powershot SD model number it is.. I must have bought at least 4 of these for my family members and one for myself. I just bought one from amazon.com "Canon PowerShot SD3500IS" and I love it... Picture is so clear and it takes pictures clean even if you zoom in 20x digital zoom no blurriness and don't need flash to get pic better it takes the best quality picture without flash.. You will see exact same lighting you see with your eyes Indoor or Outdoor. You could see examples of pictures taken with this model camera on Canon website... If you think I'm lying go ahead and try it yourself in bestbuy floor model...I even love the video quality... it has high megapixel you can ever use or need. I only recommend powershot SD model to my family/friends even these days if someone asks me which camera is good. But end of the day you or my family/friends will buy what they want... but I would recommend this camera model over any other camera or company... Only Powershot SD model I love from CANON for pocket camera

Reviews.Title: Canon SD3500
Reviews.Author: Eric D. Isaacs
Reviews.Content: I think the camera takes excellent pictures and has great zoom, it just is that the touch screen still hasn't fully progressed. I think that the next touch screen design will be better. Canon is just starting to understand how to incorporate a touch screen into camera use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Molly K. Mulligan
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  I'm really really happy with it!  I love how big and bright the touch screen is.

Reviews.Title: SD3500 by Canon
Reviews.Author: J. Harkins
Reviews.Content: Canon never ceases to amaze me with the quality of there products. My wife loves her new toy and takes it everywhere. She never misses a photo opportunity. Her friends are impressed when she is able to review the photos on the large screen and move to the next picture with a simple shake of the wrist or touch of the finger.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: HY
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's fun and simple to use. Pictures look great indoors and outdoors. Pictures looked grainy in low light conditions but I feel that's the case for such cameras so I'm fine with it.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: C. Njeako
Reviews.Content: Quality of the pics are very clear. Only thing i dont like is that the automatic focus and lightning is not always accurate. Other then that small issue it is a very good camera!

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: Valerie C. Sotelo
Reviews.Content: I had a bulky kodak. with an almost 2 year old i needed something small with a lot of features. i love this camera. it's portable, has a great selection of features. totally with every penny i spent on it for sure!

Reviews.Title: Is this the best Canon can offer?
Reviews.Author: Juliano H. Abe "Juliano"
Reviews.Content: I don't know why, but I didn't like this camera. I have a huge D90 amateur professional camera and always take with me a portable Canon Powershot cam. My old cam was a Canon Powershot SD550 and my initial impression about this new one is that the pieces an external finish it's very bad. The picture isn't the best of Canon can offer. My old SD550 has a less megapixel, but the picture it's very sharp and colourful. The picture of this new cam seems to be very dark and the automatic iso is very confused. The touch screen menu it's very difficult for a newbie person that only wants to take a picture. Sometimes the old buttons can be very easy for some people that hate technology stuffs.Good point to wide photo mode.The bad: I think that Canon can offer a better camera with this price.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Emporis Editor
Reviews.Content: This is my fifth PnS, I'm not a pro, but have active 8-yr experience with digital camera usage. While there are many factors that can be weighted to narrow down a wide selection, simple is best for personal everyday use and so crisp (low light) image quality and great HD video have emerged over time as my baseline.My most recent camera is a two-year old Lumix FX500 - I'm not completely satisfied with the photo quality (90/100), but I live with it since I Photoshop darker images, sometimes I need to take a few quick extra shots, etc. Turns out, I did not realize what I was giving up. I realize there are various settings and subjective situations that can be played with, but in reality I'd most likely use the Auto function more often and so here is where I compared.The Canon SD3500IS:1) Falls short in image quality: blurrier in actual image size (although brighter), however, magazine article shot from 3 feet was unreadable in actual size (why is this an issue for a camera at this price range?), and2) Pales in comparison re: HD video. Canon's indoor movie output was obviously fuzzier and pixelated. Not sure if this is due to the lower actual fps as a previously review mentioned. For the past couple of years I've been enjoying a clear and crisp 1280x720 video that even after I xvid-compress to a file ten times smaller looks much better than the Canon original.Now, the touch screen/menu, wide angle, compact size/lightness, all of the rest are fine and no problem, but as one elaborate reviewer previously states, this camera is: "Excellent or Acceptable Depending on your Usage". I don't carry both camcorder and camera anymore thanks to the Lumix FX500 and I want to continue that. If I just wanted an excellent PnS I would have probably picked a higher-rated Canon model such as the Canon PowerShot S90 10MP - it does not have HD though and maybe for a reason.

Reviews.Title: IT DIED - END OF STORY
Reviews.Author: RealHousewifeOfL.A.
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my daughter's Kodak that she dropped in a lake while kayaking.  No big loss because that Kodak was barely adequate (slow, okay photo quality) & we had just downloaded pictures from it.Well, I got the Canon SD3500 because 1) I've always owned Canon cameras.  None of the other 2 had problems.  2) 3.5" LCD  3) 14 mp  4) Good pocket size with reasonable features.  5) Reasonable price $250.  What could go wrong?IT DIED WITHIN SIX MONTHS.  For no apparent reason.  No one dropped it, abused it, wet it.  It just would not power on after a full charge one day.  We kept trying and trying, hoping and hoping to no avail.  Finally called Costco and Canon.  Thank goodness Costco extends warranties to 2 years.  They advised me to send it in.  Hope I don't get someone else's reconditioned camera back.The reason I bought it was because I trusted Canon's reputation.  I will give it another chance.  But if their camera fails again, I'm switching brands.  Oh, and this camera's quality was unpredictable.  Sometimes I hold it very steady and expect a clear shot and it turns out blurry.  Other times, I'm moving and it's so clear.  ???I did read the reviews on Amazon & Costco before I purchased.  Most of them were good.  There was a small but noticeable minority that had problems but I ignored those reviews because I really wanted it.  In the back of my mind, I thought maybe those were the competitors' saboteurs.  Well, I definitely am just an actual consumer and it happened to me.  Maybe I just got a lemon.  Hope the next one will be more reliable.Side note:  So we're now back to using the Canon PowerShot A2 w/ 10x zoom until we get further news.  Got it 5(?) years ago to take snapshots for kids' school yearbook.  It still takes great pictures, but I hardly use the full zoom because most of time it's blurry and the flipout LCD is only 2.5".  The body is larger, the lens cap and flash are both manual open/close, it takes 4 AA batteries, and just a little clumsier to use.  But not a bad backup.  Price by now should be way down.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: M. McGuire
Reviews.Content: I'm satisfied with this camera.  The only negative thing I can think of about it is that the screen is hard to see in direct sunlight, but that's true of any color screen.  The low light performance is impressive.  I have shots of the dark side of the moon (taken on a tripod with a timed exposure).  It's fairly fast, welcome after my old camera which seemed to take forever to come on and process shots.Photography is a skill that improves with practice.  I wonder what sort of images Ansel Adams would have come up with if he had had one of these.  Anyway, I like all my pictures so far, except for the self-portraits, which look like an old man.

Reviews.Title: Another great Canon PowerShot SD camera
Reviews.Author: Matthew G.
Reviews.Content: My wife lost her last Canon SD camera so I bought her this one.  It's a great, portable camera.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality is BAD
Reviews.Author: Andy L. Quach
Reviews.Content: i bought this SD3500IS back in May 3, 2010 to replace my older model Canon PowerShot SD870IS.  after 5 months of using the SD3500IS i've concluded the picture quality on this model is complete junk compare to my SD870IS.  when i take a picture, it comes out great on the camera screen but when i look at it on my computer lcd monitor, its just bad.  at first i thought it might be my lcd but when i tried it on my friend's lcd i get the same bad quality picture.  no matter what settings i used i get the same result.  i hate to say this but this SD3500IS picture quality is so bad i have completely lost trust with any new canon SD camera.  i think canon was too eager to release a wide screen point/shoot camera and over looked the main reason why we always liked canon digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Covell
Reviews.Content: Canon cameras are always a wonderful buy.  We purchased this camera and used it for a while before moving on to a newer model.  The touch screen is a little iffy sometimes.  The technology is amazing and continuing to improve.

Reviews.Title: breaks easily
Reviews.Author: CEL
Reviews.Content: I had this camera a year or two and it broke.  I ordered another one and within one month it broke too.  Unfortunately, I had a wedding in which my one year old daughter was a flower girl that weekend, but Canon said they could not get the camera back within one week and did not have a loaner or replacement weekend.  Very frustrated when I ordered a nice camera with a large MP to use for special events like this but now I will have to use my phone anyway.  I don't plan to order another Canon camera!

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: Dreamingmemory
Reviews.Content: My new camera is just awesome.  I'm just having so much fun with it! I needed a camera to take pictures for my brothers band when I was far away, the zoom on this camera made my day. Plus I just needed a camera for the all around fun. It takes great pictures and it has the best color and sound I've ever had in all my camera's.  This camera is the best! Thanks so much for selling it. :)

Reviews.Title: Canon power shot 14mg with 5 optical zoom
Reviews.Author: peace
Reviews.Content: I have always used Kodak products and will continue with my Kodak 14 mg/5 optical zoom, but I believe that Canon has better clarity and colored pictures.  The night feature of the Canon is superior to any camera that I have ever used.When I travel, I will take both my Kodak and Canon cameras.  The Kodak has excellent share capabilities and it is easy to manage my pictures on line. I like the rechargeable feature of the batteries on both cameras. The 5 optical zoom and motion features are outstanding on both cameras when shooting from the window of a bus or airplane. I purchased both cameras from Amazon and would suggest either camera.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: C. Group
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase - It is exactly what the desciption says - I bought this camera becaus the one I had did not perform well in low light - this camera takes great pictures in low light - outside or in - would recommend this anyone looking for a small, powerful camera - Canon got it right with this one!

Reviews.Title: Cannon 3500IS
Reviews.Author: Jeab Chuen "C.Chan"
Reviews.Content: The shiping was fast and the camera itself is great. I like it so much also good price!!!

Reviews.Title: Worest camera I ever had
Reviews.Author: Shaer
Reviews.Content: I recieved this camera one day ago...I have many P&S; all of them are less expensive but regarding the image quality,all of them better than this camera....I took few pictures under sun light and the image quality is not bad but not great...They are close to the kodak M340 which is one sixth the price of this one....The touch screen is very responsive,the design is good and it feels tough..These are the only advantages and why I gave it 2 stars...But...I expected a camera with short shutter lag and good flash and  at least  can take good pictures...But realy this camera disappointed me...The indoor pictures are BAD even using the flash which takes the whole life to load ,and on top of that long shutter lag..Pictures are noisy and you even don't want to look at them...I campared its pictures to the pictures of the Sony DSC-T500,Kodak M340,Kodak Z950 and Samsung TL225 and no comparison with the pictures of any of these....I tried all the settings hoping I'm wrong but all the indoor pictures were horrible.Maybe my expectations were high...But this what you expect from canon and for this price...I hope I'm wrong but I don't think this camera worths $30.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SD3500IS
Reviews.Author: Snap Shot
Reviews.Content: Great fun little camera. If port covers were like battery cover camera would be near perfect.

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever.  False Advertising
Reviews.Author: Everly S. Dennis "Lolli"
Reviews.Content: I hate it.  The flash is slow.  The pictures are terrible.  My blackberry takes better pictures.  My last powershot which my son broke (sd750) was so much better. DON'T PURCHASE THIS CAMERA. You will regret it like I did.  Thank goodness Amazon took it back.  It's not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel T. Linzaga
Reviews.Content: It's about the right size for a handy camera...not bulky!The touch feature is very convenient and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!
Reviews.Author: P. Busselle
Reviews.Content: Slim, light weight, large screen, well packed and shipped with just a little delay.  EXCELLENT product!  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Marginal Color
Reviews.Author: Casey
Reviews.Content: The colors always seem washed out.  Cool screen, but barely acceptable image quality.  Looking to get rid of it.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera.  love it.
Reviews.Author: Momtotomboys
Reviews.Content: this is definitely worth the very minimal cost.  the screen is really cool and it has so many features that enhance your ability to take a picture.

Reviews.Title: 2010 Christmas disappointment
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: I was sold on canon cameras by the brilliant pictures produced by their older camera's (ones with a superfine setting).  I switched from sony to canon this christmas (based on experience with SX10is and IXUS 90IS).  It was the biggest disappointment of the holidays.  (Anyone want to buy an SX30si and an IXUS 210?  Cheap.  Junk.)  If you like to shoot, zoom and crop.  Canon is the wrong camera unless you buy earlier models.  My wife has my old canon IXUS 90IS and she loves it.  I am stuck with her christmas presents - the newer models.  Canon - fire the engineers that convinced you that eliminating the superfine setting was a good idea.  I am looking around for the right camera maker.......again.  Don't buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Worsed camera yet!
Reviews.Author: Amir M. Seifi "me"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last year and from day one I told my husband the image quality is bad but he told me I don't know how to use it by the 30th day I was sure the camera is bad but by then it was to late to return it. so I'm stuck with it, not only the image quality is bad the image stabilizer is bad too. most of the pictures I take that I think it looks good in the display in my computer looks fuzzy. I have had many canons and I can't wait to get rid of this one

Reviews.Title: Great camera.. i love the large screen
Reviews.Author: Dattaguru V. Mahabal "Investor"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.Loved the features like blink detect, and face detection, detect addition and removal of person from the group... everything is great

Reviews.Title: product good but within a day dropped by 30$
Reviews.Author: chetan
Reviews.Content: I am sad to see the product price drop by 30$ in a single day sad part i got two of them :-( loss of 60$.

Reviews.Title: missing camera
Reviews.Author: cover
Reviews.Content: i order this camera and they send me an empty box.  it has everything in it but missing camera.  i am still waiting for amazon to return my money after one month send it back but they still have not return my money yet.
